post_content:
Hi all,

I’m working on a St Louis Cardinals back project and I’m getting close to finishing.  Figured I’d solicit the group to see if there’s any from my list available out there.  I’ll take any grade on the rares but probably not interested in cards with major paper loss - creasing may be acceptable.  Here’s the cards I’m looking for:

-Barbeau: Carolina Brights
-Bliss: EPDG
-Charles: Sweet Caporal
-Gilbert: Old Mill
-konetchy near ground: piedmont/sweet cap 460 series or hindu???
-Phelps: Ab350 or BL350
-Rhodes: Ab350, BL350 or cycle
-Willis Throwing: piedmont or sweet cap 460

Let me know if you have anything!
Paul Curlee
915-449-7623
[url]Paul.curlee1@gmail.com[/url]
